description:
A shoe that doesn’t put any limits on how fast, how far or where to. A shoe designed to prove that performance and sustainability should always run together.

***Please Note: Norda recommends going a half size up
name: norda run The Norda 001 - Mens

specs.value: Woven with bio-based Dyneema® for the highest performance and the lightest footprint
Diamond design pattern with bio-based Dyneema® and recycled polyester
Norda™ x Vibram® exclusive design Formation sole with Litebase® and Megagrip® Rubber. 5mm lugs
Custom designed TPU for the highest possible energy absorption and return
